mil3.3.7:1.2_0: “bhante nāgasena, yattha cakkhuviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, tattha manoviññāṇampi uppajjatī”ti?
mil3.3.7:1.3_0: “Āma, mahārāja, yattha cakkhuviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, tattha manoviññāṇampi uppajjatī”ti.
mil3.3.7:3.1_4: udāhu manoviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yattha tvaṁ uppajjissasi,
mil3.3.7:4.1_0: “Kathaṁ, bhante nāgasena, yattha cakkhuviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, tattha manoviññāṇampi uppajjatī”ti?
mil3.3.7:4.2_0: “Ninnattā ca, mahārāja, dvārattā ca ciṇṇattā ca samudācaritattā cā”ti.
mil3.3.7:5.1_0: “Kathaṁ, bhante nāgasena, ninnattā yattha cakkhuviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, tattha manoviññāṇampi uppajjati?
mil3.3.7:5.3_0: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja, deve vassante katamena udakaṁ gaccheyyā”ti?
mil3.3.7:5.5_0: “Athāparena samayena devo vasseyya, katamena taṁ udakaṁ gaccheyyā”ti.
mil3.3.7:5.6_0: “Yena, bhante, purimaṁ udakaṁ gataṁ, tampi tena gaccheyyā”ti.
mil3.3.7:6.1_1: purimaṁ udakaṁ pacchimaṁ udakaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yenāhaṁ gacchāmi,
mil3.3.7:6.1_3: pacchimaṁ vā udakaṁ purimaṁ udakaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yena tvaṁ gacchissasi,
mil3.3.7:6.2_0: “Na hi, bhante, anālāpo tesaṁ aññamaññehi, ninnattā gacchantī”ti.
mil3.3.7:6.3_5: nāpi manoviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yattha tvaṁ uppajjissasi,
mil3.3.7:7.1_0: “Kathaṁ, bhante nāgasena, dvārattā yattha cakkhuviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, tattha manoviññāṇampi uppajjati?
mil3.3.7:7.3_1: rañño paccantimaṁ nagaraṁ assa daḷhapākāratoraṇaṁ ekadvāraṁ,
mil3.3.7:7.5_0: “Athāparo puriso nikkhamitukāmo bhaveyya, katamena so nikkhameyyā”ti?
mil3.3.7:7.6_0: “Yena, bhante, purimo puriso nikkhanto, sopi tena nikkhameyyā”ti.
mil3.3.7:8.1_1: purimo puriso pacchimaṁ purisaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yenāhaṁ gacchāmi,
mil3.3.7:8.1_3: pacchimo vā puriso purimaṁ purisaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yena tvaṁ gacchissasi,
mil3.3.7:8.2_0: “Na hi, bhante, anālāpo tesaṁ aññamaññehi, dvārattā gacchantī”ti.
mil3.3.7:8.3_5: nāpi manoviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yattha tvaṁ uppajjissasi,
mil3.3.7:9.1_0: “Kathaṁ, bhante nāgasena, ciṇṇattā yattha cakkhuviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, tattha manoviññāṇampi uppajjati?
mil3.3.7:9.4_0: “Yena, bhante, purimaṁ sakaṭaṁ gataṁ, tampi tena gaccheyyā”ti.
mil3.3.7:10.1_1: purimaṁ sakaṭaṁ pacchimaṁ sakaṭaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yenāhaṁ gacchāmi,
mil3.3.7:10.1_3: pacchimaṁ vā sakaṭaṁ purimaṁ sakaṭaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yena tvaṁ gacchissasi,
mil3.3.7:10.2_0: “Na hi, bhante, anālāpo tesaṁ aññamaññehi, ciṇṇattā gacchantī”ti.
mil3.3.7:10.3_5: nāpi manoviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yattha tvaṁ uppajjissasi,
mil3.3.7:11.3_2: athāparena samayena nisammakiriyāya samudācaritattā adandhāyanā bhavati.
mil3.3.7:11.4_5: nāpi manoviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ āṇāpeti ‘yattha tvaṁ uppajjissasi,
mil3.3.7:12.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, yattha sotaviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, tattha manoviññāṇampi uppajjatīti …pe…
mil3.3.7:12.3_0: “Āma, mahārāja, yattha kāyaviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, tattha manoviññāṇampi uppajjatī”ti.
